# Installing dragon

In your terminal:

`pip3 install dragon`

## Updating

Version 1.6.0 and later:

```sh
dragon update
```

To reinstall a broken installation:

```sh
rm -rf ~/.dragon
pip3 install --force-reinstall dragon
```
